main event: On August 23, 1952, five objects attached to ten cars were observed in Delaware, Ohio, emitting yellow to red colors.
interesting points: The sighting lasted about 1 to 1.5 minutes., The objects were described as yellow to red in color., An investigation ruled out conventional aircraft lights., A letter indicated no aircraft were spotted from the local airport on the night of the sightings., Comments suggested that the objects were not of astronomical origin.
sighted object: five color-emitting objects attached to cars
witness description: A person observing from the control tower.
